metadata.title: Northern Baffin Bay Polynya - Chemistry data, 1998-1999
metadata.description: Two summer seasons of suspended and dissolved carbon speciation data in Northern Baffin Bay.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Process study of the Northwater Polynya

Supplemental Information: Risk Justification: Data not secured in regional data centre.
Risk of Loss: Medium
